tool_description: HHalign performs pairwise alignment between two HMMs or MSAs, providing detailed alignments and similarity scores.

required_parameters.name: input1
required_parameters.description: The first input file, which can be a Hidden Markov Model (HMM) file or a multiple sequence alignment (MSA) file.

required_parameters.name: input2
required_parameters.description: The second input file, which can also be an HMM or MSA file to be aligned with the first input.

optional_parameters.name: evalue
optional_parameters.description: The E-value threshold for reporting alignments.

optional_parameters.name: qid
optional_parameters.description: The minimum sequence identity threshold for alignments.

optional_parameters.name: cov
optional_parameters.description: The minimum alignment coverage percentage to report.

return_values.name: alignment_result
return_values.description: A file summarizing the pairwise alignment results, including scores, alignments, and other metrics.
